contents.NAME: [color=#4386c2]Akimi[/color]
contents.DIALOGUE:
What a long night...
I'm so tired.

contents.NAME: [color=#ebebeb]Phone Screen[/color]
contents.DIALOGUE: *MIKU CONCERT - Tickets for the next Miku concert on 3/9 are now available for purchase!*
How am I going to make that much money if I don't have a j*b?
Ugh, all of these sound awful. If only I could be a magical girl or something instead of these boring 9 to 5 j*bs....
